interpretation:
Opener:	 has 13-21 points and 5+ spades
	May have 5 hearts
Responder:	Has 6-12 points
	Denies support for spades
Forcing for 1 round

hints.hint1:
Small=13-15, Medium=16-18, Large=19-21
Look for another suit or 6+ in opening suit
hints.hint2:
13-15	6+S: 2S
	4+D: 2D
	3+C: 2C
	4H: 2H
16-18	6+S: 3S
	4+D: 3D
	3+C: 3C
	4H: 3H
	19-21	W: JS
	6+S, stoppers: 3NT
	18-19 HCP, Bal: 3NT
	7+H: 4S
	6S: 3H
	Default: 3S or 3NT
